s: Amazfit: health management expert on your wrist. Visit our official online store and explore amazing smartwatches like Amazfit T-Rex 3, Active 2, Bip 6 and more!

November 16, 2024 - Amazfit is a Chinese smart wearable brand established in September 2015 and headquartered in Hefei. Its products are manufactured and owned by Zepp Health. The brand offers wearable devices including smartwatches, fitness bands, and equipment related to health and sports.
